verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and all his \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, and all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w dominion|strong="H3027"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and against all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 34.1 \ft of his…: Heb. the dominion of his hand\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*:

And thou shalt not escape \w out|strong="H4422"\w* of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, but shalt \w surely|strong="H8610"\w* be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with thee \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 34.3 \ft he shall…: Heb. his mouth shall speak to thy mouth\f*

Yet \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of thee, Thou shalt not \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*:

\add But\add* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: and with the \w burnings|strong="H4955"\w* of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* which were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, so shall they \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \add odours\add* for thee; and they will \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* thee, \add saying\add*, \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*! for I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,

When the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and against all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that were \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, against \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and against \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*: for these \w defenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ \add This is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add were\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* unto them;

That every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* should let his \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*, \add being\add* an \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* or an \w Hebrewess|strong="H5680"\w*, \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*; that none should \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* himself of them, \add to wit\add*, of a \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

Now when all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which had \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* should let his \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*, \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, that none should \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* themselves of them any more, then they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w*, and let \add them\add* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

But \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* they \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*, and caused the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and the \w handmaids|strong="H8198"\w*, whom they had let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and brought them into \w subjection|strong="H3533"\w* for \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and for \w handmaids|strong="H8198"\w*.

¶ Therefore the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

At the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* let ye \w go|strong="H7971"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* an \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*, which hath been \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto thee; and when he hath \w served|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, thou shalt let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* from thee: but your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto me, neither \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*.\f + \fr 34.14 \ft hath been…: or, hath sold himself\f*

And ye were \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*, and had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, in \w proclaiming|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*; and ye had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:\f + \fr 34.15 \ft now: Heb. to day\f*\f + \fr 34.15 \ft which…: Heb. whereupon my name is called\f*

But ye \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* and \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and caused every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w*, whom ye had \w set|strong="H7971"\w* at \w liberty|strong="H2670"\w* at their \w pleasure|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and brought them into \w subjection|strong="H3533"\w*, to be unto you for \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* and for \w handmaids|strong="H8198"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Ye have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, in \w proclaiming|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: behold, I \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* a \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* for you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, to the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and to the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* you to be \w removed|strong="H2189"\w* into all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.  +  r 34.17  t to be…: Heb. for a removing *

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, which have not \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which they had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, when they \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* in \w twain|strong="H8147"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* between the \w parts|strong="H1335"\w* thereof,

The \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* between the \w parts|strong="H1335"\w* of the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*;

I will even \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: and their dead \w bodies|strong="H5038"\w* shall be for \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* unto the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and to the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, which are gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from you.

Behold, I will \w command|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and cause them to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; and they shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against it, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w* without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.
